humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there are no positive lymph nodes (pNO) in the right breast. This is consistent with Rules 2, 8, 10, and 11 which state that N0 indicates no positive lymph nodes or no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes, or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report states 'pNO (SN)', which indicates that no cancer was found in the axillary lymph nodes (N0) and sentinel lymph nodes (SN) that were examined. This is consistent with the N stage classification for this patient's cancer.
